title: Business Strategy Practical Competency Enhancement: Machine Learning-Based Approach for Scientific Problem-Solving Pattern Classification

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic machine learning concepts and experience in Python programming
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply text preprocessing techniques to identify problem-solution patterns.
Learners can classify problem/solution sentences with at least 85% accuracy using machine learning classification and neural network models.
Learners can draft science paper review articles based on classification model outputs.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
